Description.Name: MercNews Broadcast
Description.Details:
COMBINE ANNEXES CHAOS MARCH WORLDS



Luthien, Draconis Combine: A spokesperson for the Draconis Combine has released the following statement confirming the annexation of the Lyon’s Thumb worlds in the Chaos March: “Faced with open Lyran aggression and direct attacks on DCMS peacekeepers, Coordinator Kurita had no choice but to bring these worlds directly under Combine protection. The brave soldiers of the Combine will not rest until the Lyran aggressors are thrown back across their borders and the peace and prosperity of the region is restored.” In response, Archon Katherine Steiner has lodged a formal complaint with the Star League Council.

Description.Name: MercNews Broadcast
Description.Details:
COMSTAR DEVELOPS IMPROVED NARC!


Tukayyid, Free Rasalhague Republic: Unconfirmed reports indicate ComStar has developed an improved version of the much-maligned NARC beacon with enhanced range over the original. Further rumors suggest that alternative munition types including explosive and ECM loads have been developed, improving tactical flexibility. Technical specifications, distribution, and market release dates are unavailable at this time, as ComStar has yet to confirm even the existence of the iNARC.
